name: Elara Meadowlight
description: A keen-eyed scholar from the Verdant Plains, always seeking lost knowledge.
feats: Deciphered ancient scrolls hinting at a forgotten power.

name: Kaelen Stonehand
description: A stoic warrior from Cryspire, rumored to have wrestled a mountain troll and won.
feats: Defended the village of Oakhaven from a goblin raid.

name: Seraphina Moonwhisper
description: A mysterious figure who appeared in the ruins of Aethel, speaking of visions and omens.
feats: Foretold the coming of the Crimson Comet.
